languages.text: "Вот, значит, настолько огромно... небо. Неудивительно, что здесь вспыхнул мятеж. Как можно поддерживать порядок там, где нет ни отсеков, ни переборок?"

traits.locale_text: "Вот, значит, настолько огромно... небо. Неудивительно, что здесь вспыхнул мятеж. Как можно поддерживать порядок там, где нет ни отсеков, ни переборок?"

languages.text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
languages.original_text: "Вот, значит, настолько огромно... небо. Неудивительно, что здесь вспыхнул мятеж. Как можно поддерживать порядок там, где нет ни отсеков, ни переборок?"

traits.locale_text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
"So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
"So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
"So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
"So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
"So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"

languages.text: «De modo que el cielo es así de extenso. No es de extrañar que se produjeran motines. ¿Cómo es posible mantener el orden en un lugar sin compartimentos ni mamparas?».
languages.original_text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"

languages.text: 「つまり、これが空の広さということですか。ここで反乱がおきたのも当然のことですね。区画も隔壁もない場所で、どうすれば秩序が保たれるのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"

languages.text: “原来真正的天空是如此辽阔，难怪这里会爆发叛乱。像这种没有舱室与隔板的地方，要如何才能维持秩序呢？”
languages.original_text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"

languages.text: "So weit ist der Himmel also. Kein Wunder, dass hier draußen eine Meuterei ausgebrochen ist. Wie soll man an einem Ort ohne Module oder Schotten die Ordnung aufrechterhalten?
languages.original_text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"

languages.text: « Le ciel est donc vaste à ce point… Rien d'étonnant à ce qu'une mutinerie ait éclaté ici. Comment espérer maintenir l'ordre dans un lieu dépourvu de compartiments ou même de cloisons ? »
languages.original_text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
"So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"

languages.text: "Gökyüzü demek ki böylesine engin. İsyanın burada çıkması şaşırtıcı bir şey değil. Kompartıman ya da bölme paneli olmayan bir yerde düzen nasıl korunabilir?"
languages.original_text: "So, this is how vast the sky is. It is no wonder that mutiny broke out here. How can order be maintained in a place without compartments or bulkheads?"
